verbs.description: [ARG0: Stormy Daniels lawyer MIchael Avenatti] [V: ridiculed] [ARG1: longtime Trump lawyer Michael Cohen] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG2: for big corporate payments that showed up in his bank account starting in 2017] .
